4.1.2.2. unduwave.unduwave_incl

Contains the import statements for undupy modules

4.1.2.2.1. Attributes

cm_inch

Conversion factor cm to inch

4.1.2.2.2. Functions

to_scn(number[, norm])

Converts number to string using scientific notation

4.1.2.2.3. Module Contents

unduwave.unduwave_incl.to_scn(number, norm=True)

Converts number to string using scientific notation

Parameters:

  • number (float) – The number to convert

  • norm (bool) – If true, std scientific notation, False: With leading 0.

Returns:

The resulting string.

unduwave.unduwave_incl.cm_inch

Conversion factor cm to inch
